A subclass of Weapon representing an Apple with specific attributes.

class weapon.Weapon(name: str, damage: int)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Weapon class represents a weapon in the game with attributes for usage and damage.

possible_use¶

The number of times the weapon can be used.

Type:

int

damage¶

The amount of damage the weapon inflicts.

Type:

int

name¶

The name of the weapon.

Type:

str

Carrot Project
